wolfz1: I removed the smaller sp0+sp3 for a few reasons. 1: i forgot to put the pidgen.dll file onto the iso (the thing that no longer asks for activation). and 2: That smaller sp0+sp3 would not install onto a usb hard drive. 
The sp2+sp3 image already comes with pidgen.dll (part of the untouched sp2 corp image) and did not have any troubles installing onto a usb hard drive (on my system anyways)
